NAME: GSheets
AUTHOR: Tobotimus
SHORT: Display data from Google Sheets in discord!
DESCRIPTION: Get ranges from any Google Sheet (which is shared with the bot), and display it as a table in discord.
INSTALL_MSG:
Needs to be set up with a client secret file first. See `[p]sheets secret` in PM.
You can add sheets with `[p]addsheet`.
Get ranges from that sheet with `[p]gettable`
